description:
"We're giving you quite a big mountain to climb here. You think you're up for the challenge?"
Alan laughed when we asked him that question.
"You have no idea how big this mountain is!"
Of course, he was referring to Max, who was sitting beside him.
"It's a pretty beefy one, isn't it?"
"Yeah," Alan replied.
"Have you climbed one this big before?"
"I don't believe I have!"
Max thought it was funny that they were referring to him as "the mountain."
It was his first time getting fucked — ever. He seemed pretty calm about it.
"I'll take good care of him," Alan said. And he did!
title: Max & Alan
